Literature.Title: A Tachyplesin Antimicrobial Peptide from Theraphosidae Spiders with Potent Antifungal Activity Against Cryptococcus neoformans
Literature.Author: Michira BB, Wang Y, Mwangi J, Wang K , Asmamaw D, Tadese DA, Gao J, Khalid M, Lu QM, Lai R, Li J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 32045(MIC=>=89.8µM),Cryptococcus neoformans BNCC 225501(MIC=89.8µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>89.8µM),Candida auris(MIC=44.9-89.8µM)
